projectGridLines.title: Project details given in Description
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Change management for system implementation for a global pharma

Description: Develop strategies around effecting change management and communication for a global pharma undergoing a major system implementation

Skill sets: MS PowerPoint

Traits expectation: Good communication skills, good awareness of clinical trial phases, R&D organization scope within pharma companies

Expected learning: knowledge about ways of working of R&D organization. Client communication and stakeholder management

Specific courses required for project execution: NA

Title: Business process mapping for clinical teams

Description: Create business processes

Skill sets: MS PowerPoint

Traits expectation: Good communication skills, good awareness of clinical trial phases, R&D organization scope within pharma companies

Expected learning: learn how to do process mapping, how to determine existing process gaps and move towards optimization. Client communication and stakeholder management

Specific courses required for project execution: NA

Title: Business process mapping for regulatory teams

Description:

Skill sets:

Traits expectation: Good communication skills, good awareness of clinical trial phases, R&D organization scope within pharma companies

Expected learning: Learn how to do process mapping, how to determine existing process gaps and move towards optimization. Client communication and stakeholder management

Specific courses required for project execution: NA
